Posts.Content: 4everhopeful wrote: I got my scan results back on Monday...the 9 treatments of Chemo - Taxol has shrunk my liver tumors a little.  Dr. wants to continue with this chemo for another 9 treatments and then another scan in June.  Hopefully the tumors will shrink more than a little this time. I was somewhat happy with the results, as the liver mets didn't get worse. My Exsistance is My HOPE! Dx 9/30/2005, IDC, 5cm, Stage IV, 18/22 nodes, mets, HER2+ Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: New Liver Mets 4everhopeful kirby

Posts.Content: 4everhopeful wrote: Had a " 5 YEAR CANCERVERSARY " party on the weekend.  It was a huge success.  44 of my friends came.  It was a blast.  Never laughed so hard in years!  Makes me feel good that I have so much support!  Looking forward to many more years of celebrating! My Exsistance is My HOPE! Dx 9/30/2005, IDC, 5cm, Stage IV, 18/22 nodes, mets, HER2+ Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: 5 Year Cancerversary Party 4everhopeful lwd

Posts.Content: 4everhopeful wrote: Well I had the worse news ever on Monday.  After months of Navelbine treatment, found out that my livers mets actually grew!  I'm devastated with this news!  So the next step to to try a clinical trial at another hospital.  Have my appointment on Nov 28th.  If there's no trial, then only one more chemo that my dr. has to offer me.  If that doesn't work...it's the end of my journey. Not handling this too well right now.  I need to get my head around this and move forward.  So hard!  My Exsistance is My HOPE! Dx 9/30/2005, IDC, 5cm, Stage IV, 18/22 nodes, mets, HER2+ Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Navelbine Failed Liver Mets 4everhopeful Priscilla0929
